CmdLine: set -x     && PYTHON2_VERSION="2.7.14"     && PYTHON34_VERSION="3.4.7"     && PYTHON35_VERSION="3.5.4"     && PYTHON36_VERSION="3.6.3"     && pyenv install "$PYTHON2_VERSION"     && pyenv install "$PYTHON34_VERSION"     && pyenv install "$PYTHON35_VERSION"     && pyenv install "$PYTHON36_VERSION"     && pyenv global system "$PYTHON2_VERSION" "$PYTHON36_VERSION" "$PYTHON35_VERSION" "$PYTHON34_VERSION"
